payload.description: [Pricing component] designed for [showcasing annual subscription plans with monthly option]. [Features centered header with title and description, monthly/yearly toggle with discount indicator (-10%), and responsive grid of pricing cards. Each card includes plan name, price with dynamic calculation, feature list with checkmarks, and CTA button]. [Responsive layout transitioning from stacked to side-by-side cards with consistent heights]. [Customizable pricing calculations, toggle states, button styles, and card gradients. Supports price recalculation on toggle]. [Ideal for SaaS platforms, subscription services with annual discount options].
